content: pattern updated 1/23/2023 scrubby is seamless worked in a spiral so no joins works up fast ## **unsinkable scrubby** ## using a serrated knife shave a small amount of foam from a pool noodle and place inside before you close it pool noodles never get hard so it is always squeezable check out my other free pattern using this yarn here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/wheel-scrub-it-scrubby
